Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=3.1 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=6.3 µM), S. aureus (MRSA) (MIC=25 µM);yeast Candida albicans (MIC=100 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Identification and structure-activity relationship of an antimicrobial peptide of the palustrin-7 family isolated from the skin of the endangered frog Odorrana ishikawae.
Literature.Author: Iwakoshi-Ukena E, Okada G, Okimoto A, Fujii T, Sumida M, Ukena K.
